result.title: Teach Your technique
result.content:
Hello everyone. I am a new problem solver. But i want to be a good competative programmer. So need your help. Which system or procedure is perfect for me and for a beginner problem solver. I mean after complete any language which is able to competitive programming like C, C++, Java etc which step i will take like algorithm, mathematics, data stucture or another one. How many times i spend in a day? What kind of algorithm i will practices?

Which one is priority number 1 and which one is last?

Finally i want to say that i just need suggeation to be a good programmer or world class programmer.
